description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Help packito to clean the galaxy! Picking all the garbage without forgetting to use the right color. Beware of evil dust throughout the 15 levels of play!
description.short: Help packito to clean the galaxy! Picking all the garbage without forgetting to use the right color. Beware of evil dust throughout the 15 levels of play!
